name: ADSBexchange.com
description:
Live air traffic and aircraft positional data via ADS-B / MLAT / UAT

NOTE: Please scroll down to view the Terms & Conditions for use and Legal Notice.

api_methods.name: Aircraft Last Position by Hex ID (icao)
api_methods.description: Returns one aircraft last known location using the mode-s hex (icao), if aircraft has flown in the last 48 hours.

utterances.utterance: Can you show me the last known position of the aircraft with hex code A4B605?
I need the latest location for the plane with the ICAO code 4CA123.
What's the last recorded position of the aircraft identified by hex 3D4F56?
Find the most recent location for the aircraft with the ICAO hex 7C6B09.
Could you provide the last known coordinates for the plane with hex code 5A7C8D?
Tell me the last position of the aircraft with ICAO identifier 8F9E10.
I want to know the last location of the aircraft with the hex code 2B3C4D.
Can you get the last known position for the aircraft with ICAO hex 6E7F8A?
Please find the last recorded location of the plane with hex code 9A0B1C.
What is the last known position of the aircraft with ICAO code 1D2E3F?

api_methods.name: Aircraft Live Position by Hex ID (icao)
api_methods.description: Returns one aircraft using the mode-s hex (icao)

utterances.utterance: Can you show me the current position of the aircraft with hex ID a4b605?
I need the live location of the plane with the hex code 7c6b29.
What's the current position of the aircraft identified by hex 4ca123?
Find the live position for the aircraft with hex ID 3d4f56.
Where is the plane with the hex identifier 5f8e9a currently located?
Get me the live tracking data for the aircraft with hex code 2b7c8d.
Show the current location of the aircraft with hex ID 9a1b2c.
I want to know the live position of the plane with hex code 6e4d3f.
Can you track the aircraft with hex ID 8f7e6d for me?
Please provide the current position of the aircraft with hex identifier 1c2d3e.

api_methods.name: Single Aircraft Position by Hex ID (icao)
api_methods.description: Single aircraft Position by ICAO Mode S 6-digit transponder hex code (if currently tracked)

constraints.format: ICAO Mode S 6-digit transponder hex code

utterances.utterance: Can you show me the current position of the aircraft with ICAO code a4b065?
I need the location of the plane with the transponder code b2c3d4.
Where is the aircraft with ICAO hex code 1a2b3c right now?
Find the current position for the aircraft using the ICAO code f5e4d3.
Locate the plane with the ICAO transponder code 3e4f5a.
Can you track the aircraft with the hex code 9a8b7c?
Show me the position of the plane with ICAO code 4d5e6f.
I want to know where the aircraft with transponder code 7c8d9e is currently located.
Get the current location of the aircraft with ICAO hex 2b3c4d.
Please provide the position of the plane with ICAO code 6f7e8d.

api_methods.name: Single Aircraft Position by Registration
api_methods.description: Single aircraft Position by Registration (if currently tracked)

utterances.utterance: Can you show me the current position of the aircraft with registration number N8737L?
Where is the plane with the registration code G-ABCD right now?
I'd like to know the location of the aircraft registered as D-ABCD.
Please provide the current position of the aircraft with registration number F-GZCP.
What's the current location of the plane with registration code JA123A?
Can you tell me where the aircraft registered as VH-OQA is right now?
I need to find the current position of the plane with registration number C-FGAX.
Where is the aircraft with the registration code B-16701 currently located?
Could you show me the location of the plane registered as ZK-NZE?
I'd like to see the current position of the aircraft with registration number EI-DVM.

api_methods.name: Aircraft within 250 NM Radius
api_methods.description: Show all Aircraft within 250 Nautical Mile radius of a point

parameters.name: lon
parameters.description: Longitude (-180 to 180) Hint: US is negative longitude!

utterances.utterance: Can you show me all aircraft within 250 nautical miles of New York City?
What's the air traffic like around Los Angeles?
Display all planes flying near Tokyo.
I want to see the aircraft within 250 nautical miles of Sydney.
Show me the planes currently flying around Paris.
What aircraft are within 250 nautical miles of Rio de Janeiro?
Can you list the aircraft near Cape Town?
I'd like to know about the air traffic around Moscow.
Are there any planes flying near Cairo?
Show me the aircraft within 250 nautical miles of Mumbai.

api_methods.name: Aircraft by Squawk
api_methods.description: Returns one or more aircraft currently broadcasting a specific squawk code

parameters.name: sqk
parameters.description: 4-digit Transponder Squawk Code in Octal (ie.1200, 7700, 1234 etc.)

utterances.utterance: Show me the aircraft broadcasting the squawk code 7700.
Can you find planes with the squawk code 1234?
I need information on aircraft using the squawk code 7500.
What aircraft are currently using the squawk code 7600?
List the planes with the squawk code 7000.
Find aircraft broadcasting the squawk code 2000.
Which planes are using the squawk code 1000 right now?
Give me details on aircraft with the squawk code 3000.
Are there any planes with the squawk code 4000?
Show aircraft currently using the squawk code 5000.

api_methods.name: Aircraft within user specified distance up to 250 NM
api_methods.description: Show all Aircraft within specified distance up to 250 NM

parameters.name: lon
parameters.description: Longitude (-180 to 180) Hint: US is negative longitude!

utterances.utterance: Can you show me all aircraft within 100 miles of New York City?
Find all planes flying within 50 nautical miles of Los Angeles.
What aircraft are currently within 200 miles of Miami?
Show me the planes within 150 miles of Chicago.

Display all aircraft within 250 miles of Houston.

What aircraft are flying within 60 miles of Boston?
Show aircraft within 90 miles of Las Vegas.

api_methods.name: Tagged Military Aircraft
api_methods.description: Returns all active aircraft tagged as Military

utterances.utterance: Show me all the military aircraft currently in the air.
Can you provide a list of active military planes right now?
I want to see the current military aircraft in flight.
Give me details on all military aircraft that are currently active.
What military aircraft are flying at the moment?
List all the military planes that are currently airborne.
Can you show me the active military aircraft in the sky?
I'd like to know which military aircraft are currently operational.
Are there any military planes flying right now?
Display all military aircraft that are currently in the air.
